context_bundle.content:
Multi-agent coordination patterns.

Orchestration:
- Task decomposition
- Agent assignment
- Result aggregation
- Conflict resolution

Communication:
- Shared context (PhiSHRI doors)
- Message passing
- State synchronization
- Handoff protocols

Patterns:
- Pipeline: Sequential processing
- Fan-out: Parallel processing
- Voting: Consensus decisions
- Specialist: Domain routing
